Hextech Munitions.name: Hextech Munitions
Hextech Munitions.blurb: Corki's basic attack deals a percentage of their damage as magic instead of physical. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.
Hextech Munitions.description: Innate - Hextech Shrapnel Shells: Corki's basic attacks are permanently modified to deal 20% AD  physical damage and 80% AD  magic damage.
Hextech Munitions.description2: Innate - The Package: After 8 minutes elapse,  The Package is delivered to both corners of Corki's fountain, which he can pick up after channeling for 1 second. Doing so grants him one cast of  Special Delivery which must be cast before  Valkyrie within the next 60 seconds, as well as  40% bonus movement speed out of combat prior to the ability being cast, after which  The Package goes on  cooldown before being delivered again.
Hextech Munitions.notes:
* All players are alerted by Corki emitting a global siren/alarm sound upon picking up The Package.
 Triggering attacks will apply on-hit effects normally.
 Spellblade damage is converted to magic damage. This effect will not be consumed if Hextech Munitions' magic damage is enough to kill the target.
 The damage from  Runaan's Hurricane's Wind's Fury is not affected by Hextech Munitions.
 Both components apply  life steal even though on-hit magic damage does not usually interact with it.
  Critical strikes amplify both components' damage.

Phosphorus Bomb.name: Phosphorus Bomb
Phosphorus Bomb.blurb: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
Phosphorus Bomb.description: Active: Corki launches a bomb at the target area, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
Phosphorus Bomb.description2: The bomb  reveals the area as it travels and for 6 seconds afterwards, as well as all affected enemies.

Valkyrie.name: Valkyrie
Valkyrie.blurb: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
Valkyrie.description: Active: Corki  dashes to the target location, dropping bombs that leave up to 3 blazing patches along his path, depending on the distance traveled, lasting for 2 seconds.
Valkyrie.description2: These patches deal magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies within.
Valkyrie.leveling2:
Magic Damage Per Tick:
15 / 22.5 / 30 / 37.5 / 45 (+ 10% AP)
Total Magic Damage:
120 / 180 / 240 / 300 / 360 (+ 80% AP)
Valkyrie.notes: * Applies  persistent damage in an  area of effect range.

Special Delivery.name: Special Delivery
Special Delivery.blurb: Corki hurtles forward a long distance, knocking aside enemies and creating a trail of scorched earth that damages opponents who remain in it.
Special Delivery.description: Active: Corki  dashes  unstoppably to the target location with extreme speed,  knocking aside all enemies hit 500 units and leaving behind a fire trail for 5 seconds.
Special Delivery.description2: The trail  slows enemies by 90% and deals 7.5 −  25 (based on level) (+ 37.5% bonus AD) (+ 5% AP) magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies within, for a maximum of 150 −  500 (based on level) (+ 750% bonus AD) (+ 100% AP) magic damage.
Special Delivery.description3: Enemies hit directly are  knocked aside, but are  slowed and burned for at least 1 second.
Special Delivery.description4: Casting Special Delivery instantly resets Valkyrie's  cooldown.
Special Delivery.notes: * Applies  persistent damage in an  area of effect range.

Gatling Gun.name: Gatling Gun
Gatling Gun.blurb: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.
Gatling Gun.description: Active: Corki sprays bullets in a frontal cone for 4 seconds, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all enemies hit, and reducing the target's  armor and  magic resistance each tick, stacking up to 8 times, lingering for 2 seconds.
Gatling Gun.leveling:
Mixed Damage Per Tick:
7.5 / 10.625 / 13.75 / 16.875 / 20 (+ 10% bonus AD)
Total Mixed Damage:
120 / 170 / 220 / 270 / 320 (+ 160% bonus AD)
Resistance Reduction Per Tick:
1 / 1.375 / 1.75 / 2.125 / 2.5
Total Resistance Reduction:
8 / 11 / 14 / 17 / 20
Gatling Gun.notes:
* Applies  persistent damage in an  area of effect range.
 The direction of the gun firing changes depending on where Corki is facing.

Missile Barrage.name: Missile Barrage
Missile Barrage.blurb: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
Missile Barrage.description: Passive: Corki periodically stocks a missile, up to a maximum of 7, and starts with 7 missiles every time he respawns.
Missile Barrage.description2: Active: Corki fires a missile in the target direction that explodes upon the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage in an area.
Missile Barrage.description3: Every third missile Corki fires is a  Big One, dealing 100% increased damage with increased range and explosion radius.
Missile Barrage.notes:
* Once Corki has put a skillpoint into this ability, he receives a buff that automatically tracks the number of times he's used his ultimate since the last Big One.
 Since this information is represented as a buff, This information is available to both allies and enemies.

 Corki retains progress towards The Big One when he dies
 Once Corki has his ultimate, he has an indicator below his health bar that is only visible to him that shows when a Big One will be fired, how many missiles he has in reserve, and how many more missiles he can store.
